channel.title: Hugo on monochromefrog
channel.description: Recent content in Hugo on monochromefrog

item.title: Hugo To The Rescue
item.description: Earlier this year I decided to reactivate my site’s blog section. Turns out things are not going pretty well. First, I’ve clean-installed my computer and forgot to install my trusty website generator app, Mixture. Second, Mixture developer discontinued the app and took it down from the website. Well, I’m screwed. After playing with several static site generators listed at StaticGen, I am now trying to get along with Hugo. Why I choose Hugo?
